@BWPanda @jenlampton and others, the description of the '#type' => 'help' form element in https://api.backdropcms.org/form_api#help says:

Add some help text to the top of a page.

That is not accurate, as the help element may be rendered anywhere on the form (and also controlled via its #weight property). Are you happy to change that to something like:

Adds text and styles it as help text.

Sure @BWPanda ...done: https://github.com/backdrop-ops/api.backdropcms.org/issues/105
